actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: To amend the Military Selective Service Act to prohibit registration and to halt the activities of civilian local boards, civilian appeal boards, and similar local agencies of the Selective Service System.

summary.text: Selective Service Standby Act of 1990 - Amends the Military Selective Service Act to prohibit, after November 30, 1990: (1) requiring a person to submit to registration under the Selective Service System (SSS); (2) the President from appointing a person as a member of a civilian local board, civilian appeal board, or similar local agency of the SSS; and (3) any such board from meeting. Prohibits a person from being denied any right, privilege, benefit, or employment position under Federal law by reason of failure to so register after such date.

titles.title: To amend the Military Selective Service Act to prohibit registration and to halt the activities of civilian local boards, civilian appeal boards, and similar local agencies of the Selective Service System.
